name: Battlefield Alliance（战地联盟）
description: Do not give up your fighters, do not give up your position, do not give up your honor. Do not give up your fighters, do not give up your position, do not give up your honor. Do not give up your fighters, do not give up your position, do not give up your honor. Important thing to say three times!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, or 7 Processor: 1Ghz or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
